definition: to provide physical relief, as from pain
details:
verb
- to provide physical relief, as from pain
= example: to provide physical relief, as from pain
= synonyms: relieve
- to satisfy thirst
= example: to satisfy thirst
= synonyms: slake, quench, allay
- to cause to be more favorably inclined
= example: to cause to be more favorably inclined
= synonyms: gentle
